description: This file is a JavaScript module that defines a seed function for inserting static course lesson data into a database table named 'course_lessons'. It includes example lesson data for various courses and an exported async function 'seedLessons' that performs the database upsert operations using Supabase. The code handles batching, error handling, and respects feature flags, serving as a script to seed initial or static data into the educational content management system.

methods.name: seedLessons(customSets)
methods.description: Asynchronously upserts lesson data into the 'course_lessons' table, optionally accepting custom seed sets to override default data. It batches operations to avoid payload limits and ensures that conditions such as feature flags are met before proceeding.
